topic.title: Problem: Word files with embedded picture data cannot be exported

body.p: The export of .doc and .rtf documents might fail if they contain embedded objects in a format other than Word's native format. To overcome this problem, convert the embedded objects into graphics before importing.

ol.li: Open a document in Microsoft Word and locate all pictures, one after the other.
Click a picture, and observe the status line.
If the status line shows Double-click to edit Unknown, this picture is not stored in native format.
Mark this picture and press CTRL-SHIFT-F9, which converts the embedded object into a graphic.
For verification, click the picture again. The Double-click to edit Unknown message should not appear.
Continue until all pictures are processed this way.
